casebody.data:
Charles Northrop, Respondent, v. Alfred H. Smith, Impleaded, &c., Appellant. Decided June 23, 1887. Appeal from judgment en*563tered upon the verdict of a jury, and from order denying defendant’s motion upon the minutes for a new trial.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Opinion Per Curiam.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
